title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: After performing the steps to reproduce, the Navigator adds the file in the specified location but does not show the file extension.
EB: The Navigator should add the file with the appropriate file extension in the specified location after performing the SaveAs operation.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Make modifications to the file
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog will appear. Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension as it is not requested.
6) Click Ok.
